text: the internet is filled with a lot of

this brings us to today's video we're
will be discussing the mystery of the

have been appearing on the internet with

out there is incredibly passionate about
captain cut cheese key lime pies the

wide web in hundreds of places this
caught the attention of some 4chan errs

there was a reasonable explanation so
they began to dig early on in the search
they discovered that cut cheese Key West
cafe opened in 1978 and closed in either

while the now-infamous online posts

one of the names that was utilized the
most was Roger ramjets
a cartoon from the 1960s after a bit of

sneaked a microfilm into a pie is it

pie were actually secret codes the
Internet was looking literally

Cochise cafe they thought it was strange
how a small cafe that had been closed

researched the company on the California

why cut cheese Key West cafe is
needlessly listed on this site is a

another reason why they thought there
